pt.runtime

Class PoisonPill

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.runtime.PoisonPill

  • public class PoisonPill
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    11/05/2013 This class represents a fake task, which is used to kill thread, 16/05/2013 Do not use wait() anymore when the thread get the lock, Set the variable "isKilled" to true, the thread will not pick up another task. Add a condition here to check if the worker thread who get the lock, its local queue is empty. If not empty, re-insert this fake task back to the queue. If is empty, stop working, 23/05/2013 Change the constructor from default to "PoisonPill(int num)" Change the field of "counter" from the type of AtomicInteger to PoisonPillCountDownLatch Add a new constructor Add a new HashMap in order to record which worker thread actually take the fake task.
    Author:
    Kingsley
